coreAtributes.name: Sheer Circle Sleeve Top
coreAtributes.description: A transparent top with flared circle sleeves, made of extremely thin fabric.

displacementText.playerSelf: You slip off your sheer top over your head
displacementText.playerNPC: You slip off [npc.name]'s sheer top over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly pull off [npc.name]'s sheer top.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slips off [npc.her] sheer top over her head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls off your sheer top.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc.Name] slips off [npc2.name]'s sheer top over [npc2.her] head.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull up your sheer top.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly pull up [npc.name]'s sheer top.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls up your sheer top.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on your sheer top over your head.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull on [npc.name]'s sheer top over [npc.her] head.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly pull on [npc.name]'s sheer top over her head.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls on [npc.her] sheer top over her head.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls on your sheer top over your head.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls on your sheer top over your head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc.Name] pulls on [npc2.name]'s sheer top over [npc2.her] head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls on [npc2.name]'s sheer top over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your sheer top
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly pull down [npc.name]'s sheer top.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls down your sheer top.
